name: Boblin
text:
Hello there! You look new!
How are you?

name: Boblin
text: Names Boblin, nice ta meet ya. I'm the local Burger Salesman, say, have you ever tried a delicious hamburger before?

name: Boblin
text: No?!?!?!?!?!?! Well, you should totally try one sometime! It only costs a dollar!

name: Boblin
text: You don't have any money? Well.... that's too bad, you should definately come back when you get some though!
